thread.title: SHARIA JUSTICE: Woman WHIPPED 26 TIMES in front of mob for having sex outside marriage
thread.title_full: SHARIA JUSTICE: Woman WHIPPED 26 TIMES in front of mob for having sex outside marriage

title: SHARIA JUSTICE: Woman WHIPPED 26 TIMES in front of mob for having sex outside marriage
text:
Getty 1 of 11 Daesh released this video in 2014 of a masked man standing with British hostage Alan Henning before his execution The young woman clutches her head in her hands and cries out in agony as she is thrashed 26 times 
She had allegedly broken the strict Sharia law in Banda Aceh province in Indonesia - a popular sunny getaway for many Britons. 
After her brutal punishment was over, the man she is accused of having sex with was brought on to serve his lashing, flanked by police officers. 
He grimaces as he is also forced to face 26 lashes on the back. 
Sharia guards often dole out cruel punishment for violating Islamic law. EPA The man accused of having sex with the woman also suffers his punishment EPA The woman is examined by officials after her caning 
Sharia law is the legal system of Islam which is derived from both the Koran and the rulings of the religion's scholars. 
Islamic laws have been strengthened since the Aceh province struck a peace deal with the central government in 2005. Related articles
